description: City-savvy yet trail-ready, this new iteration of our popular Universal sandal combines fashion and function in equal measure. Featuring a sawtooth, Vibram Megagrip outsole, a soft midsole for enhanced comfort, and REPREVE recycled polyester straps, quick-dry materials will keep you comfy from slick sidewalks to day hikes in the hills.
name: Teva Universal Trail - Mens
